Type.Name: IServiceProvider

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServiceProvider

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: This interface is implemented by a class or value type that provides a service to other objects.
The method of this interface obtains the object that provides the service.
The interface is implemented by a number of types, including , , , and .

summary.para: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service object; that is, an object that provides custom support to other objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetService(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed

summary.para: Gets the service object of the specified type.

returns.para: null if there is no service object of type .

Docs.param: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
